data.message: Hello, is there an email to a manager? Facebook's lack of customer service is completely unacceptable. I contacted you all two months ago regarding unauthorized charges and have only gotten one email back basically asking me to provide details that I already provided in the first 5 messages I already sent! IS THIS HOW YOU TREAT SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS? ENOUGH IS ENOUGH ALREADY!

replies.message: Hi Eboni. You're able to dispute charges that you didn't authorize or agree to by reaching out to our Billing team here: http://bit.ly/2qtqr4d. Hope that helps! -William
Hi William I've done that already. If there is nothing else I can do in the meantime I guess I will just continue waiting on a response. Thank you for the reply.
Eboni Lacey The customer service is terrible for small business owners. I agree with that.

I really wonder if there is a customer service phone number or any other way to get a hold of anyone at  Facebook , i also wonder if they're all bots or something ,  because if you notice anytime someone has a problem they give you links to go to , and they never give you a phone number to call or to please private message them
